trans-unit.source: PrintForm Component (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: PrintForm 组件 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: PrintForm Component (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: PrintForm 组件 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component for [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] enables you to print an image of a Windows Form at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件可以对[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]使你能够在运行时打印 Windows 窗体的图像。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: Its behavior replaces that of the `PrintForm` method in earlier versions of Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 其行为取代了 Visual Basic 早期版本中的 `PrintForm` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The PowerPack controls are no longer included in Visual Studio, but you can download them from the [Download Center](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=25169).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 中不再包含 PowerPack 控件，但你可以从 [下载中心](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=25169)下载它们。

trans-unit.source: PrintForm Component Overview
trans-unit.target: PrintForm 组件概述

trans-unit.source: A common scenario for Windows Forms is to create a form that is formatted to resemble a paper form or a report, and then to print an image of the form.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体的一个常见方案是创建格式设置为类似于纸质表单或报表的窗体，然后打印窗体的图像。

trans-unit.source: Although you can use a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> component to do this, it would require a lot of code.
trans-unit.target: 虽然您可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>组件来执行此操作，它将需要大量的代码。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component enables you to print an image of a form to a printer, to a print preview window, or to a file without using a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件，您可以打印到打印机、 打印预览窗口或文件的窗体的图像，而无需使用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>组件。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component is located on the **Visual Basic PowerPacks** tab of the **Toolbox**.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件位于**Visual Basic PowerPacks**的选项卡上**工具箱**。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: When it is dragged onto a form it appears in the component tray, the small area under the bottom border of the form.
trans-unit.target: 将其拖动到窗体上时，它将显示在组件栏中，组件栏是窗体下边框之下的小块区域。

trans-unit.source: When the component is selected, properties that define its behavior can be set in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 选中该组件后，可以在“属性” 窗口中设置定义其行为的属性。

trans-unit.source: All of these properties can also be set in code.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些属性也可以在代码中设置。

trans-unit.source: You can also create an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component in code without adding the component at design time.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以创建的实例<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件而无需在设计时添加该组件的代码中。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: When you print a form, everything in the client area of the form is printed.
trans-unit.target: 打印窗体时，将打印该窗体工作区中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: This includes all controls and any text or graphics drawn on the form by graphics methods.
trans-unit.target: 这包括所有控件和通过图形方法在窗体上绘制的任何文本或图形。

trans-unit.source: By default, the form's title bar, scroll bars, and border are not printed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不打印窗体的标题栏、滚动条和边框。

trans-unit.source: Also by default, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component prints only the visible part of the form.
trans-unit.target: 此外，默认情况下，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件打印窗体中的，只有可见部分。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user resizes the form at run time, only the controls and graphics that are currently visible are printed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户在运行时调整窗体大小，则只打印当前可见的控件和图形。

trans-unit.source: The default printer used by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component is determined by the operating system's Control Panel settings.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用的默认打印机<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件取决于操作系统的控制面板设置。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: After printing is initiated, a standard <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> printing dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 启动打印后，一种标准<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>打印对话框随即显示。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: This dialog box enables users to cancel the print job.
trans-unit.target: 用户可通过此对话框取消打印作业。

trans-unit.source: Key Methods, Properties, and Events
trans-unit.target: 关键方法、属性和事件

trans-unit.source: The key method of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component is the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A> method, which prints an image of the form to a printer, print preview window, or file.
trans-unit.target: 主要方法<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件是<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>方法，打印到打印机、 打印预览窗口中或文件格式的图像。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: There are two versions of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A> method:
trans-unit.target: 有两个版本的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>方法︰</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>

trans-unit.source: A basic version without parameters: `Print()`
trans-unit.target: 不带参数基本版本︰`Print()`

trans-unit.source: An overloaded version with parameters that specify printing behavior: `Print(printForm As Form, printFormOption As PrintOption)`
trans-unit.target: 使用指定打印行为的参数的重载的版本︰`Print(printForm As Form, printFormOption As PrintOption)`

trans-unit.source: The `PrintOption` parameter of the overloaded method determines the underlying implementation used to print the form, whether the form's title bar, scroll bars, and border are printed, and whether scrollable parts of the form are printed.
trans-unit.target: 重载的方法的 `PrintOption` 参数将决定用于打印窗体的基础实现；是否打印窗体的标题栏、滚动条和边框；是否打印窗体的可滚动部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintAction%2A> property is a key property of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintAction%2A>属性是键属性的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the output is sent to a printer, displayed in a print preview window, or saved as an Encapsulated PostScript file.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定是将输出发送到打印机、显示在打印预览窗口中还是另存为封装的 PostScript 文件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintAction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintAction>, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintFileName%2A> property specifies the path and file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintAction%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintAction>、<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintFileName%2A>属性指定的路径和文件名的名称。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintFileName%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintAction> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrinterSettings%2A> property provides access to an underlying <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> object that enables you to specify such settings as the printer to use and the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrinterSettings%2A>属性提供对基础<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>对象，可用于指定要使用的打印机和打印的份数诸如设置</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>的访问</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrinterSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also query the printer's capabilities, such as color or duplex support.
trans-unit.target: 此外还可以查询打印机的功能，如颜色或双工支持。

trans-unit.source: This property does not appear in the **Properties** window; it can be accessed only from code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不显示在“属性” 窗口中；只能从代码对其进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Form%2A> property is used to specify the form to print when you invoke the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component programmatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Form%2A>属性用于指定要打印在调用时的窗体<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件以编程方式。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Form%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the component is added to a form at design time, that form is the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果在设计时向某窗体添加了该组件，则该窗体为默认窗体。

trans-unit.source: Key events for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component include the following:
trans-unit.target: 关键事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件包括以下︰</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.BeginPrint>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.BeginPrint>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>调用方法之前打印文档的第一页。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.EndPrint>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.EndPrint>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the last page is printed.
trans-unit.target: 在已打印最后一页之后发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.QueryPageSettings> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.QueryPageSettings>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.QueryPageSettings>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before each page is printed.
trans-unit.target: 在打印每一页之前立即发生。

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: 备注

trans-unit.source: If a form contains text or graphics drawn by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> methods, use the basic <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A> (`Print()`) method to print it.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体中包含文本或图形绘制<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>方法时，使用基本<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>(`Print()`) 方法，以打印它。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Graphics may not render on some operating systems when the overloaded <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A> method is used.
trans-unit.target: 在某些操作系统上可能无法呈现图形时重载<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>使用方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of a form is wider than the width of the paper in the printer, the right side of the form might be cut off.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体的宽度大于打印机中纸张的宽度，则窗体的右侧可能被截断。

trans-unit.source: When you design forms for printing, make sure that the form fits on standard-sized paper.
trans-unit.target: 设计要打印的窗体时，请确保窗体可容纳于标准尺寸的纸张之上。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a common use of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm> component.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示一种常用的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>组件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm>

trans-unit.target: 另请参阅
